description:
We've all heard or used this term, but never has it been so appropriate as it is in this shoot. Darling is a sexual dynamo who's appetite for cock is insatiable.
We tie this little slut up tight, just the way she likes it, and let Derrick has his way with her. She is thrown around and manhandled, tormented, and fucked so hard that she collapses into a gibberish speaking puddle.
title: Fucked Silly
